alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butte, northwestern Lawrence and east central Crook Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 144 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Beulah, or 10 miles west of Spearfish, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Butte, northwestern Lawrence and east central Crook Counties, between Beulah and Spearfish. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 5. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 203 and 207. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Northern Foot Hills
